attributes.action: Launch an immediate investigation into the Muslim clerics of hate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the Prime Minister to publicly condemn and launch an immediate investigation into the racist & hateful words spoken by the Muslim clerics recorded by an undercover reporter for the programme Dispatches which was aired on Monday 15 January 2007.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
